name: Rock Paper Scissor with twist
description:
Rock Paper Scissor Game with two playing modes

each match has 3 rounds and to win a match you need to win 2 rounds

Playing Modes

   KNIGHT : you can choose any card to play

   SNEAKER : you need to select 3 cards before starting the match

    in Knight vs  Sneaker knight's played card will be shown to sneaker then sneaker will play accordingly

   in any remaining its combination its simple rock paper scissor

Rules

rock>scissor>paper>rock
